DOC.brief_title: A First Time Man Study Asses Safety Tolerability AZD7624 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Double-blind Placebo-controlled , Randomised , Single centre , First Time Man Study evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Single Ascending Inhaled Doses AZD7624 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year Able inhale SPIRA nebuliser accord provide instruction Females must negative pregnancy test screen admission ( Day 1 ) CPU , must lactate must nonchildbearing potential . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive weigh least 50 kg 100 kg inclusive . FEV1 > 80 % predict normal value .
